snippet.title: Laser Light (PC MS-DOS, 1994)
snippet.description:
A fun and innovative puzzle game in which you have to arrange mirrors to reflect the laser light from the source to required target in each level. Gameplay of the first 19 levels.
Emulator: DOSBox 0.74
Operating system: GNU/Linux Ubuntu 16.04
